name: Project-Starfish
description:
Been working on this game for a week and now that I have polished the movement & combat mechanic, also finished the first level for the game. I feel ready to show the world my baby! 

Please feel free to comment & give me some critique and pointers to what you would like to see in the game. Or what does and doesnt work in the game currently! 

Note: The name of the game is yet under development. "Project Starfish" is only a placeholder for now! 

Thanks
